name: Echoverse DevOps Board
body: A structured DevOps roadmap using Echoverse source code. Covers CI/CD, containerization, cloud deployment, monitoring, and more.

cards.note: Set up GitHub Actions to deploy backend automatically on push
Add Dockerfile for backend (and frontend optionally)
Create a Render deploy script or API integration
Add diagram to README showing Echoverse architecture
Connect GitHub Secrets to Render deployment workflow
Test POST request to backend from GitHub-hosted frontend
Explore using Terraform to deploy Echoverse infra
Learn best practices for secure MongoDB Atlas networking
Deployed Echoverse frontend to GitHub Pages
Backend live on Render and connected to MongoDB
IP whitelisted on MongoDB Atlas for remote access
